long_description: Why settle for underwhelming instant coffee when you can enjoy the speciality Grower's Cup Brew-in-the-Bag coffee? It tastes great and is easy to take along when you're traveling and backpacking. Imagine a French press inside a pouch and you've got the Grower's Cup Brew-in-the-Bag; brewing is as easy as adding 16 fl. oz. of hot water and letting it steep for 5 - 8 min. Inside the pouch is a filter with 26g of freshly ground, fair-trade specialty coffee; most flavors are organic. Beans are slow roasted in small batches to deliver the finest taste. Makes 3 cups of coffee. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Why settle for underwhelming instant coffee when you can enjoy the speciality Grower's Cup Brew-in-the-Bag coffee? It tastes great and is easy to take along when you're traveling and backpacking.
